description: Polygiene AB provides antimicrobial technology for treatment of textiles and other materials. The company is headquartered in Malmo, Skane and currently employs 41 full-time employees. The company went IPO on 2016-03-14. The firm's main product Poligiene Odor Control technology treatment for various garment, such as sport, casual, towels, beddings, among others. The Poligiene Odor Control technology prevents the growth of odor-causing bacteria and fungi and based on silver salt technology. The Polygiene Odor Control technology is bound and permanently integrated in the fabric. The firm cooperates with wide range of partners within clothing industry, namely Adidas, Patagonia, Athleta, Polartec, Hugo Boss, La Sportiva, Hilly, Lafuma, Salomon, among others. In addition, the Company develops a variety of home textiles products in partnership with Showa Nishikawa- a Japanese home textiles producer.
naicsNationalIndustry: Men's and Boys' Cut and Sew Underwear and Nightwear Manufacturing
name: Polygiene AB
